combatSkills.name: Grand Fall
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Ultra Earth P.Attack w/temp Str. Boost and Ultra Unguard Rate & [Allies] P.Resist and M.Resist+50%/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Axe Howl
combatSkills.description: [Allies] Fast Earth Attack Dmg.+50%/5 turns & [Self] +3 Actions (75% Null P.Attack x1 for Allies exc. Special Arts)

combatSkills.name: Earthrend Crush
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Super Earth P.Attack w/temp Str. Boost and Ultra Unguard Rate & [Allies] removes Str. and Mag. debuff exc. Assist Skills

combatSkills.name: Shock Wave
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Hi Earth P.Attack Dmg.+50% per each [Self] Str. Buff Skill & Hi Penetration Rate

passiveSkills.name: Earth Manifestation
passiveSkills.description: Thunder Resist+35%. When countering and attacking, regular P.Attack a Foe with Earth Element
